content: garn peer gynt 91 m/50 g good alternative yarns could be world of wool marble 110m/50g or king cole merino blend superwash 104m/50g or warth mill saddleworth dk 200m/100g 3 5 mm 80 cm circular needle or whatever size needed to meet gauge 2x different clip-on stitch markers one for beginning of round one for halfway round enjoy
